issue.title: [R] Bindings for log base b
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13626](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13626). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This was skipped in ARROW-13280 because the C++ library didn't supported it, but ARROW-13345 has now been merged.

Continue to call the more efficient fixed-base kernels when the base is the scalar value e, 10, or 2. Call `logb_checked` when the base is a non-scalar or a scalar that's not e, 10, or 2.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13626?focusedCommentId=17415171) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11133
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11133>
